Name: PvZ2_Preprelease_KF_P0

Updates.en: **Jurassic Marsh might be finished in the future.**
**The author has his own plan to design the Kongfu Temple world, needless of guidance.**
Updates.zh: **作者对武林寺庙世界已经有规划，不需要指导。**

Updates.en: Added Fire Gourd. Snow Pea is modified back to how he behaves in the past.
Updates.zh: 加入火葫芦，寒冰射手调整成为旧的攻击模式。

Updates.en: Added Kongfu Drinking Zombie, Bomb Zombie, Gong Zombie, Rocket Imp Zombie, Monk Drinking Zombie, Bronze Statue, Bronze of Toughness and Bronze of Qigong (Kongfu Monk Imp and Bronze of Hook undone).
Updates.zh: 加入功夫醉酒僵尸、自爆僵尸、铜锣僵尸、火箭小鬼、武僧醉酒僵尸、铜人雕像、大汉铜人、气功铜人（侠客铜人和武僧小鬼日后完成）。

Updates.en: Added Kongfu Levels (1-8, by @保罗-刘) in the Arcade for experiments.
Updates.zh: 加入功夫关卡（1-8，作者@保罗-刘），可到游戏机内试玩。

NewFeatures: **作者对武林寺庙世界已经有规划，不需要指导。**
加入火葫芦，寒冰射手调整成为一代攻击模式。
加入功夫醉酒僵尸、自爆僵尸、铜锣僵尸、火箭小鬼、武僧醉酒僵尸、铜人雕像、大汉铜人、气功铜人（侠客铜人和武僧小鬼日后完成）。
加入功夫关卡（1-8，作者@保罗-刘），可到游戏机内试玩。
EnNewFeatures: **Jurassic Marsh might be finished in the future.**
**The author has his own plan to design the Kongfu Temple world, needless of guidance.**
Added Fire Gourd. Snow Pea is modified back to how he behaves in PvZ1.
Added Kongfu Drinking Zombie, Bomb Zombie, Gong Zombie, Rocket Imp Zombie, Monk Drinking Zombie, Bronze Statue, Bronze of Toughness and Bronze of Qigong (Kongfu Monk Imp and Bronze of Hook undone).
Added Kongfu Levels (1-8, by @保罗-刘) in the Arcade for experiments.
